name: Quarantine Arena
description:
Save your home from covid-demons, with an arsenal of weapons and upgrades. Fight off the waves, and secure your freedom. 

 

The Team:

  • Andrew Pyle: Coder
  • Christalynne Pyle: Artist
  • Xander Pyle: Composer
  • Cameron Ingles: Artist
  • Tim Willits: Voice Actor

Thank you for taking the time to view our project, made for the 2020 Quakecon Game Jam, for the theme "There is no place like home!". This was made in a short time frame of 20 hours. Big thanks to everyone that assisted in making it come alive, especially to Tim Willits for his time and contribution.

Good luck, have fun! We will see you in the arena.

Credits

------------------

Voice Lines: Tim Willits

Coding: Andrew Pyle

Art: Christalynne Pyle, and Cameron Ingles

Music: Quake, Xander Pyle
